website_summaries.verdict: The Galaxy S9 Plus just edges out the LG V35 ThinQ and is only $15 more on AT&T. But get the V35 ThinQ over the slower Pixel 2 XL.
pros: The super fast LG V35 ThinQ is water resistant, has a headphone jack, a brilliant OLED screen and a long-lasting battery
cons: The phone is LG's priciest to date and its AI camera features still need work

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is getting overlooked simply because it doesn't say Apple or Samsung or Pixel. This is a true flagship phone. Speedy, buttery smooth, amazing screen and battery life. As of right now it gets 5 stars. I'll update this in 3 months. Update after 90+ days. My review remains the same. Even with tons of apps downloaded, a few personal tweaks, that don't require rooting, this phone is still amazing. Love the dual cameras on the back and the AI cam is more function than gimmick in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Xanthus N. Murdaugh

customer_reviews.title: An incomparable value for a flagship phone with no compromises!
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone!!! I've had a V30 and a G7 and this is literally the best of both phones. It has a great display, it's stupid fast, and it's got all-day battery life. I was shocked that the unlocked phone supported WiFi calling, but can confirm that WiFi calling works with AT&T as well as T-Mobile, but not on Verizon. Don't know about Sprint. It's a steal for the price and the best phone I've had in some time!!!
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera!
customer_reviews.text: I did some research on this phone prior to purchasing it and I must admit that this is quite possibly the best cellphone camera I've ever used. I've had the iphone 7 plus, google pixel 2 XL and the motorola X4, and in my opinion LG V35 is the best cellphone camera between the four that I've experienced. It's (AI) artificial intelligence mode and wide angle lens is what did it for me. The colors are lightly saturated but that's what I want from my camera experience.
customer_reviews.author: CosmoDee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect retirement gift for myself !!
customer_reviews.text: After many cheap phones I usually bought in the past I decided to get good one for my retirement years. It was a great decision. I have many other LG products in my house but this is the first phone. Excellent !! Fast, right size, clear to read, fun to watch movies or my Direct TV favorite channels. Most fun I had so far was with the camera. Me and my grand children spent hours to produce funny pictures and video clips !! I also want to try to take some picture of the night sky (in the manual mode). I recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Jemelka

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone, Good Price, Working Volte & VOWIFI on AT&T
customer_reviews.text: Received my phone yesterday and to my delight I have all the features of the carrier branded model working out of box on AT&T at a fraction of the cost. Great camera, the AI feature is a little slower than the P20 Pro, but the adjustable filters are pretty neat within each AI shooting mode once it detects a scene. Battery life also seems great so far, very happy with my phone. I wanted something waterproof for vacation, and the Mil Spec durability doesn't hurt either. Included Quad Beats earbuds are pretty decent as well, and Hi-Fi Quad DAC to go wtih it. Looking forward to testing this out further over the next week!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Its a Fantastic Phone with an awesome Camera, but.....
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, I love this phone...Primarily for the wide angle camera and a few other features. The Battery life is good, but it is a new phone...so it should be. But its not charging now, I think LG make great phones except for their usb charging ports....second LG with this problem. Overall I think the customer service I received for my G6 was abysmal, which is making me not even try for the V35.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Gubbins

customer_reviews.title: Return NOT recognized
customer_reviews.text: The phone looks beautiful but it did not work so well on my Network. I started a Return right away but decided to give The LG V35 a go since Amazon gave me time to return the phone. The phone actually behaved worse. I printed and packed everything... Delivered to UPS received my confirmation BUT there is no confirmation I have done so. This is a very expensive item. Please help me Resolve this issue. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Melani Tutt

customer_reviews.title: It really isn't worth the hassle
customer_reviews.text: The battery life on this phone is abysmal. I've had better life with 2 year old iphones. That alone means this isn't worth the price tag, but you throw in the performance issues and crashes I have had, I really feel like I flushed $600 down the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: DLaPoint

customer_reviews.title: The V30 vs V35 = Great Lifestyle Improvement.
customer_reviews.text: V35 is 100% better than V30. Really great phone. It goes head to head with even the Galaxy S10 in real world experience. Only Cons: •It's a wide phone so watch out for that. A downside for smaller hands and being limited to extra slim protective cases. •It's a bottom firing speaker phone. No problem at all for homes with many Bluetooth speakers in different rooms & ppl with wired or quality Bluetooth earbuds on the go. Without these these cons it would be even better than the Galaxy S10 overall. I'm an experienced tech enthusiast & 100% am aware that's how good the phone is.
customer_reviews.author: everestmusic

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to buy this phone, I've never bought an unlocked phone. I bought it during Prime Week. Honestly, it's been great so far. Decent battery life, fairly fast charging, great cameras and sound. I like that they kept the power button on the back like the older lg phones, I had a G3 and loved it. So far it hasn't let me down at all. Set up was a incredibly easy I didn't have to take it into Verizon or anything, just inserted my SIM card and it did the rest for me, and it was cheaper than any brand new phone on the market. All in all, I'm pretty pleased with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I thought
customer_reviews.text: It's not a full 4 weeks and the finger print reader has stopped working. The phone also lags. I'm not super thrilled with the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kal Far

customer_reviews.title: Great build and design.
customer_reviews.text: All the good stuff has already been said. All I can say is if this phone showed up on your list of choices and there is some confusion or you just came across it, look no further. Be you the frequent flagship phone user looking to get something other than the samsung or apple experience or the person venturing into the world of flagships, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Wolvilm

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Smove Stabilizer and wanted to use my LG V35 on the Smove to shoot a Bar Mitzvah. The result was amazing! Really smooth action with high quality video! Thing is much of the action was on the dance floor with mixed mood lighting and that was no problem for the LG V35. I transferred the video to Premiere Pro on my desktop and the HD quality and color was as good if not better than some of the professional cameras that cost a few thousand dollars! Simply amazing!
customer_reviews.author: mustbebelize

customer_reviews.title: Updates to Android 9 pie on Verizon
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for a month and I'm satisfied so far. Battery life isn't great. Call quality is good. Screen is good. Camera is good. On Verizon it updated to android 9 pie yesterday. You are able to not activate all the Amazon stuff like Alexa if you don't want to. Face recognition works kind of spotty for me so far. Fingerprint scanner works good. Kind of pricey. I bought it because I could make 5 monthly payments. You can get the same phone without the Amazon stuff for less money. Overall I'm happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE S

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: The phone design is great, the screen is very nice and I like that the WiFi calling and VoLTE work on AT&T. Fingerprint reader is very responsive and the calls sound clear. The only issue for me is the camera, you think you’d get a lot better camera at this price point (even though I got it on sale), you really have to have perfect lighting to get a good shot. Battery life is good and I can be a heavy user of my phone some days and I have yet had the phone die on me. All things considered if you can catch it on sale I’d say go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Techie tg

customer_reviews.title: Full of bloatware
customer_reviews.text: The specs say it's a nice phone, but I'm 10m into it and I'm already fed up by all the tweaks and bloat that the phone has. I'm removing the 2nd star as the phone has not kept up properly. The phone featured music playing, but now the phone keeps on skipping audio every ~30s, which becomes slightly worse when using bluetooth. The Music app has trouble even keeping the playlist in order. Listening to an entire album is a mess if you keep your playlist for too long as the songs will shuffle.
customer_reviews.author: Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone and Great Value
customer_reviews.text: The phone was priced $200 less than AT&T. And since it was unlocked, no contract. Great battery life and easy to move my data from my old phone to this phone. Loving it so far!!
customer_reviews.author: John R. Tackett

customer_reviews.title: Decent price and excellent phone.
customer_reviews.text: Based on my experience on T-Mobile. You get WiFi calling and VoLTE. You can disable all Amazon apps if you don't use it. Lucky, Amazon disable ads on lockscreen if not I won't purchase this phone.
customer_reviews.author: TechJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to go caseless...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone - no cases available. V30, V30+, and V30s cases DO NOT FIT the V35. The camera is positioned differently, 5-6mm lower on the V35. Otherwise, it's the best phone available - all things considered.
customer_reviews.author: KindleBonfire

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointment
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about the Amazon & Alexa Integration. I found Google still there (kind of annoying) The battery was less than lasting the finger print reader only worked after tapping it at times. And others it would try to read right after you picked up. Super inconsistent. And the Alexa built-in was spotty at best.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Sent Back
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this phone until I installed LG's updates. After installing the updates Google Play Store no longer worked and none of the usual fixes remedied the problem. So the phone is going back. This is totally unacceptable to have this type of problem with a product. The tech industry needs to remove its head from its sphincter.
customer_reviews.author: jdkchem

customer_reviews.title: It's an ok phone
customer_reviews.text: The alexa works about half the time you try to use it. Phone freezes frequently. " ok google" stopped working after about 2 months I'm not sure why. It's kind of inconvenient having the power button on the back. The battery life is great and the fingerprint scanner always works but in general i hate this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Horizontal screen banding
customer_reviews.text: customer service to get a horizontal screen banding issue fixed is incredibly difficult. Both on LG's and Amazons side. EDIT: After roughly 3 hours of talking with customer service Amazon's customer service helped me sort out a replacement phone . Honestly I wasn't expecting too much considering LG seemed hesitant to replace it. Raising the review of the phone back to four stars since amazon seems to be willing to help fix the screen issue.
customer_reviews.author: mlaurum

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful bargain.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing better in my opinion, than getting what you paid for is getting MORE than you paid for. Though the V35 ThinQ offers all the latest bells and whistles you should expect from a 2018 flagship, all wrapped up in a beautifully crafted package that compares favorably with the competition I find myself agreeing that it's not quite worth it's $899.99 MSRP. Or rather, that I could get a very nice handset for a good deal less. At $649.99 for the Prime Exclusive version it's an absolute STEAL!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Eyerly

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. It lacks fancy features but if all you do is NFC payments, SMS/Email, GPS, and phone calls then you can't go wrong. It is snappy for all the standard things you would do with it, battery life is good, charges relatively quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Mast

customer_reviews.title: Premium Phone
customer_reviews.text: After doing some research and comparing different phones. I'm glad that I chose this one. I love that it's light weight, fast, and an amazing camera. I bought my wife a Note 9 and I must say that the Note 9 does not compare to LG V35 ThinQ. The LG blows the Samsung out the water on a lot things such as the camera, speed, and lightweight. Don't get me wrong the Samsung is great phone, but not worth 1k. This is a much better value and trust me you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Run don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: Bought had about three days then just started rebooting for now reason had 90 percent battery strong signal and phone just turned off and back on did this 4 times in about 10 minutes put in back in box and sent back has some kinda of issues.
customer_reviews.author: bobby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Phone. Will definitely keep for years.
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone a lot. Especially with the Prime Exclusive price point. That being said, i did have an issue with the GPS constantly spinning trying to determine my orientation. I tried to calibrate it as many time as possible, but no avail. That being said, GPS works fine to navigate and determine my exact location, so no biggie. 5 stars all day long
customer_reviews.author: A. Binghunaiem

customer_reviews.title: Love it, nice and using it for Cricket Wireless.
customer_reviews.text: First of...this was a replacement from the first one that was stolen on the way. Depending what you order from UPS, has a risk of being stolen...the guy handed it to me, a visibly open, empty brown box. Thanks to USPS, 2nd one arrived all complete. Surprised that 20gb is just for the Android operating system...ram is good, casting is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: C. Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: NO WIFI CALLING on Verizon network
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this if you use Verizon. You cannot make wifi calls. I live in an area with crappy Verizon service and depend on wifi calling when phone service is especially awful. Even though Verizon SAYS "bring your own phone" you won't have all services.
customer_reviews.author: Bugl3t

customer_reviews.title: Good start, degrades quickly
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for about 7 months now, and I'm surprised by how much it has degenerated as a whole. The phone has good specs, was incredibly cheap, and runs all of my apps well. The battery was initially fine, but the phone now loses 50% of its charge after an hour of just lightly browsing Chrome, without playing videos. Furthermore, swiping to type is incredibly inaccurate, and I often get very different words from my gestures. Lastly, the fingerprint sensor also acts as a power button, and now it often reads double-clicks when I try to make it sleep. I'll need to get this replaced way ahead of schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone. Will be buying LG from now on.
customer_reviews.text: Had this phone for abput a week now and I have to say, Im impressed. Im a heavy user, I watch a lot of movies games, etc. The colors are absolutely vivid and great contrast, The oled screen is just great. Battery life could be better but LG included battery saving options which I have not yet tried but look promising. However I plan on buying a battery case for this phone soon, so power wont be an issue. LG has gained a faithful lifetime customer. Good work!
customer_reviews.author: Tubbs

customer_reviews.title: Alexa hands free isn't as functional as one would hope
customer_reviews.text: It's a good phone, on par with maybe a Samsung 8. The home screen is a bit slower but that's probably LGs launcher. I am having a problem with the Alexa hands free option not staying enabled on a device restart, and it's the sole reason I chose this phone. When it is enabled, it works like a charm. Even from an locked state. But the idea of having to flip that setting each time the phone is updated or restarted is a bit absurd and leanse to wanting to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, processing power is on par with the newer V40, but this costs about $350 less. The only compromises are the lack of additional camera's and there's a lack of cases available for this.
customer_reviews.author: Faster Tomorrow

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC CAMERA!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best camera on a phone I've ever had! My friends are jealous lol!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Muse

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money by a long shot. Looks pretty tho
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely not worth$700. That's the first thing. It is the fastest phone I've ever had but I've also had a $50 phone from the dollar store and it was almost as good as this one. Certainly not a $650 difference. I regret getting this phone now. Will not make this mistake again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone! :)
customer_reviews.text: It is my third LG phone. The camera is great. The sound is absolutely amazing. Alexa features are ok. Very happy and also you can apply to Google-fi.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Sanchez Tovar

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: One of the best notch less phones out here. The specs are still on par with the recently announced V40. The screen is big and clear with a little more height than usual but it's not a deal breaker. The bezels are slim and have a slight curve. The software is still andriod so you can change almost anything you don't like.
customer_reviews.author: Krassodo

customer_reviews.title: The best phone no one buys!
customer_reviews.text: The things LG does on their phones amazes me that they don't sell more phones. This V35 has it all. Battery life, screen quality and performance. Yeah, some of the other manufactures have catchy things on their phones also but the way LG sets up their phone so you can personalize sets them apart. If you ever make the move to an LG you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Prime options
customer_reviews.text: Glad I have prime membership, because I was able to get a really good phone at a good price, without being locked into my carrier
customer_reviews.author: Game Test

customer_reviews.title: So Far I love this phone... I dont understand why the Alexa one is so much more
customer_reviews.text: So Far I love this phone... I dont understand why the Alexa one is so much more than the ATT branded ones.. But It doesnt have the bloatware and ATT logos when booting up and the battery life is better on the Alexa one
customer_reviews.author: Michael D

customer_reviews.title: Simply Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Super fast no lag what so ever. Screen colors are awesome and the camera rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Paintballer grrl

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a broken S8 plus with this phone. Can hardly tell the difference. Works great and i appreciate the other reviewer on here about flashing this with LG OEM firmware. Couldn't be any happier.
customer_reviews.author: Arif A

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy phones from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth don't work wifi don't work if you want a cheep phone because of mandatory bloat this phone is for you. RETURNED.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas B.

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: This LG V35 was my first LG phone I ever bought and owned since I mostly use Samsung phones. My curiosity was always there to give LG a shot since I love what they do on their camera hardware and software. $399 dollars to do all of this on a late 2018 LG flagship phone that is UNLOCKED 100% with no bootup logos of any kind and super clean? Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: John R

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for only $300
customer_reviews.text: You get great battery life, fingerprint sensor, face recognition, takes really good pictures, and has a full glass body. What is there not to like...... I know, the only thing I do not like about the phone is that the face recognition is not very good.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced Average Phone
customer_reviews.text: Very average phone and overpriced for what it is. The only real plus is built in audiophile DAC. Design is clunky and the mail button/fingerprint reader on back is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: R. Nagamitsu

customer_reviews.title: The LG V35 telephone
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of this phones, one for me and the other for my husband. They were easy to set up and move the information from our old telephones. This phone has a long battery life and I have gone several days without needing to charge. I have not tried Alexa yet as I have been very busy but am excited about setting it up. I have watched movies from Amazon Prime Videos on both my smart tv and my new phone. Also, the LG V35 has an amazing camera and the pictures look absolutely breath taking.
customer_reviews.author: Marie in Memphis, TN

customer_reviews.title: Powerful phone but not a fan of the displays color.
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and very responsive. Has the specs of all the current heavy weights. However, coming from the LG V20, the oled screen on the V35 appears to be much warmer even in the coolest setting and it took a little getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: Roji Eappen

customer_reviews.title: Best phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone so much, it does crack very easily. And I'm trying to find a way to repair, however I do recommend this phone a lot. It's the best! Just buy a good case and screen to protector
customer_reviews.author: Cristopher

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this phone. I have zero complaints. Very nice picture and fantastic battery life. Fingerprint scanner works great. I upgraded from the galaxy s7. It has nothing on this phone.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Best so far
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly this has been my favorite phone throughout the years. Ive had iPhones, Samsung, Motorola and a handful of lesser known brands. This phone is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: BEST PHONE EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. In my opinion, it's better than any other phone out there in the market. High end specs, all the necessary bells and whistles, oled screen, and great battery life. Amazon apps don't get in the way of enjoying this phone. The price is a big plus too!
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love.
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. I love hands free mode. If you have playful friends remember to turn off that mode before joining them. It can be funny however.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The speaker sucks, so you’ll need headphones or a Bluetooth speaker for SURE. It’s fast, looks good, and plays games on ultra settings. It has a headphone jack with a quad DAC!!!! Amazing sound from the headphone jack, with a very cool surround sound mode.
customer_reviews.author: diamond jim

customer_reviews.title: Phone has seen better days. (Only got phone 4 motnjs ago)
customer_reviews.text: The battery already decreases rapidly. I switched from an iPhone, and that was a big mistake. The screen already cracked a little, despite having a case from the beginning. Very dissapointing for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Naftali ostreicher

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I really like this phone. Great low light photos and also plays 192 khz audio etc
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Features.  My Daily Driver.
customer_reviews.text: Phone was received fast and in excellent condition. The quality of the LG V35 is shown in every detail. This is a great and fun to use!
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: God I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: This v35 is awesome and does anything you could ask of a phone. I do kinda miss my second screen on the v20 but the trade off is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Works on Verizon cell/data, but no wifi calling
customer_reviews.text: I love the Amazon LG V35, but when activating on Verizon the cell phone calls and data worked, but no wifi calling. Because cell reception at my house is spotty I must have wifi calling. I learned that Verizon will only let phones they sell have the wifi calling feature. I compared specifications among Verizon phones and ended up with Samsung S9+.
customer_reviews.author: KE

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, brilliant colors
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone. Sound quality (wired) is second to none. Bluetooth is even good. Cameras and screen are amazing. Hiighly recommend, especially for audiophiles.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: good phone.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for wife as a replacement for an aging phone. It's everything she wanted. Very nice phone.
customer_reviews.author: Delores Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the price I got it at. Phone prefoms well and has a nice screen. The wide angle camera is great for getting more in the shot, regular camera is good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent powerful phone even being a year or so old. It's weird getting used to the power button on the back of the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Somerville

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I've ever used. Easy, intuitive features and operating system.
customer_reviews.author: INVETREP

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: This phone is a great value! It is fast, has great resolution and good sound quality. The only one minor inconvenience is the power button that is positioned at the back of the phone. When the phone is mounted in a holder (i.e. in a car), you would need to unmount it to turn it on or off.
customer_reviews.author: denis

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great and has a lot of features. I was really surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: It's unlocked and using it with Metro PCS, so far so good, no problems whatsoever
customer_reviews.author: Juan Manuel Delgado

customer_reviews.title: great price, fast delivery, quality brand
customer_reviews.text: I like LG smart phones and tablets. They are durable. (I use quality case) And take excellent pictures. The price was great too! Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome build quality, lots of RAM, and the picture quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny Shadouh

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof, doesn't overheat, has great battery life. I love this phone
customer_reviews.author: Fuyuki

customer_reviews.title: Bought this phone for my mom...
customer_reviews.text: And she loves it! She's had no complaints about it and it's very easy to understand. Huge upgrade from her 4+ year old Alcatel she had. It's fast, stylish, and fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Alexa
customer_reviews.text: This phone works amazing equivalent to the iphone x minus the front facing camera outside of portait mode, the only issue is that i cant get hands free alexa to work
customer_reviews.author: David Kopatich

customer_reviews.title: Get a case
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about it you definitely need a case for it
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic phone
customer_reviews.text: If only Alexa could be removed... Thankfully it can be deactivated.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Thevenin

customer_reviews.title: Best phone ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing phone that is lightning fast, takes a phenomenal photo, and holds a charge all day with heavy use!
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Cline

customer_reviews.title: Great phone camera
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone. Sound is not as loud as I hoped it'd be. Alexa works great but when phone goes to sleep it shuts its self off so you have to continuously turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy shum

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, but needs a different firmware for full Google Fi support.
customer_reviews.text: Good upgrade from my previous phone, though had to do some work for full functionality on Google Fi which involved flashing a Fi specific firmware that can be downloaded very easily. Whole process from first unboxing to using the phone normally took about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Cody D Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great pg
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! Had it for a few months now and it still runs like the first day I got it. Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Upchurch

customer_reviews.title: Great value for even a top end phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is amazing. It is by far superior to any other phone I have owned, including Samsung products. It's fast, reliable, and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Updated to Android Pie
customer_reviews.text: Had no issues setting up the phone. After 3 consecutive updates, it update to Android 9, Pie. Only issues are on my end, in getting used to the differences between Motorola and LG.
customer_reviews.author: eddie

customer_reviews.title: Thses
customer_reviews.text: Its not what it made out to be i think the galaxy note 8 is a much better phone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery is great
customer_reviews.text: Phone works great no problems way better then the lgv20 I had before

customer_reviews.title: Its a downgrade from LG V30
customer_reviews.text: Its inferior from LG V30, battery is inferior, display is less bright, performance is okay, you won't feel any difference. camera on LG phones are average. if you take photos in auto mode stay away from this phone..

customer_reviews.title: Crashes a lot :(
customer_reviews.text: I recently got this phone and had high hopes for this one as the reviews were pretty good. I only used for couple weeks so far, and the phone and the apps on the phone crashes a lot and sometimes just closes or stops working without alert. I am very disappointed and considering to return this phone

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine
customer_reviews.text: I have had no issues at all with my LG V35 ThinQ with Alexa Hands-Free cell phone. It works as well as i expected it to and the was integration with Alexa was seamless. The screen size is a bit small for me and it was a bit pricey. Overall i definitely recommend it. #FounItOnAmazon
customer_reviews.author: Truer Reviewer 2019

product_meta.title: LG V35 ThinQ with Alexa Hands-Free – Prime Exclusive Phone – Unlocked – 64 GB – Aurora Black
product_meta.description: Color:Aurora BlackLG V35 ThinQ with Alexa Hands-Free. Simply say “Alexa” to play music, hear the news or check the weather wherever you are. Just ask- and Alexa will respond instantly. The LG V35 ThinQ comes with 6" QHD+ OLED FullVision display for vibrant viewing, two 16 MP rear cameras with AI Cam to analyze subjects and the environment in your frame to provide recommendations to get the perfect picture, 8 MP wide-angle front camera, Qualcomm Snapdragon 845 octa-core processor up to 2.8 GHz, and much more.
feature_bullets: Pre-installed selection of Amazon apps, including the Amazon Widget, Amazon Shopping, and Amazon Alexa. Prime members have easy access to daily deals, Prime movies and TV shows, Prime Music, Amazon Photos, and more with a single sign-on experience
Amazon exclusive version with Amazon Alexa Hands-Free: Simply by saying “Alexa” you can play music, hear the news or check the weather wherever you are. Just ask - and Alexa will respond instantly
6" QHD+ OLED FullVision display (2880 x 1440) with 18:9 aspect ratio, 6 GB of RAM and 64 GB of internal storage with option to add up to 2 TB of microSD expandable memory, and Android 8.0
Qualcomm Snapdragon 845 octa-core processor upto 2.8 GHz and fast 4G LTE speed
Dual 16 MP standard-angle and wide-angle rear AI cameras with LED flash, 8 MP wide-angle front-facing camera with Selfie Light
3,300 mAh non-removable battery with USB Type-C fast charging (wireless charging enabled, wireless charger sold separately)
Facial recognition and fingerprint sensor to instantly unlock your phone
Reliable design: IP68 dust and water resistance and passed different military standard tests for durability (MIL-STD-810G certification)

Unlocked for the freedom to choose your carrier. Compatible with AT&T, Sprint, T-Mobile, and Verizon networks. SIM card not included. Customers may need to contact Sprint for activation on Sprint’s network
Prime members and accounts are limited to the purchase of 4 of LG V35 ThinQ with Alexa Hands-Free every 12 months

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars315 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: SIM Ejector, QSG, Travel Adapter, Device, USB Cable
